Kongli asks Baida, who is a hopeless gambler, to impersonate Tietong so as to keep Kaixin under his control. Kaixin falls for the sham and believes that Tietong has reincarnated. (重)二十年后，圆慧的胞弟紫薇真人高居当朝国师。开心小和尚从少林寺调到乌龙寺做主持，使该寺戒律院主管铁空又气又爱，更是搞得县衙门老爷、师爷头痛不已。街头混混百搭阴差阳错成了开心的铁桶师叔，麻烦接踵而来。

programme.title: 星期二特写 - 我就是我 Tuesday Report - Be Myself - EP 3
programme.desc: "Be Myself" is an 8 episode series produced by Tuesday Report, revealing stories of a group of young adults aged 35 years and below. They are not afraid to face new challenges, and are determined to realise their dreams. The series aims to explore how the attitudes and values of these young adults shaped who they are today. “星期二特写”八集系列《我就是我》，讲述一群三十五岁以下年轻人的精彩故事。这群年轻人有个性，有特色，有想法，对生活充满热情，对社会有独特见解，并且勇于面对生活挑战，敢于追逐自己的梦想。节目探讨年轻人的态度与价值观，看看他们如何打造自己的人生，创造一条与众不同的道路。

programme.desc: Wulie discloses to Zhiyuan that Yunxue is actually Ruli. Daoying figures out that Zhiyuan is the culprit for all the conflicts, so he wants to divorce her. Daoying is unconscious after a scuffle with Zhiyuan and the incident is recorded by a hidden pin camera by Yunxue. She uses the video to threaten Zhiyuan if she reports her to the police. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)武烈透露给智媛尹雪其实是如莉。道英分析后，断定所有发生的事是智媛指示的，便提出要跟她离婚。两人在拉扯中智媛把道英撞倒,昏迷过去。事发过程被尹雪的摄像机拍下。尹雪便拿视频威胁智媛，如果举报她，她会把视频公开。

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 38
programme.desc: Yunxue reveals to Daozhi the reasons Zhiyuan adopted her when her father passed away. Daozhi collaborates with Yunxue to chase Zhiyuan out of WID Group. They plan to get married. Zhiyuan becomes the CEO for WID Group and she fires Yunxue immediately. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)尹雪告诉道治智媛父亲过世后领养她的目的。两个打算合作摧毁智媛并跟其结婚。智媛终于如愿当上了WID集团的董事长, 上任后就将尹雪开除。

programme.title: 大话精 True Lies - EP 7
programme.desc: Nadia and Aidan starts dating. Jenny jumps ship to another company and Ming Lie introduces a new colleague who turns out to be Mei Qi. Aidan is shocked to see that Mei Qi looks exactly like Eva and is certain that Eva is faking Mei Qi's identity. Nadia insists that Mei Qi is her long lost sister. Aidan is worried that Nadia will get scammed; he tries to prove that Mei Qi is actually Eva and ends up arguing with Nadia. (PG)Nadia和Aidan开始交往。珍妮跳槽别的公司，明烈介绍新同事，竟是美琪！Aidan惊见美琪与伊娃一样长相，认定是伊娃冒认美琪！但Nadia却说美琪就是自己失散的亲妹妹。Aidan担心Nadia被骗，想证明美琪是伊娃，却一再与Nadia发生口角。

programme.title: 花遊記 A Korean Odyssey - EP 31
programme.desc: Shanmei succumbs to serious injuries in the battle with the black dragon and Wukong loses his memory. Elder Subhuti brings Shanmei's spirit back from the netherworld to help Wukong remove the gold band so that Wukong can return to the celestial world. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)善美在与黑龙搏斗后伤重身亡，悟空则失忆。须菩提为了帮悟空解除金刚箍，特地到冥界把善美的魂魄带到水帘洞去。善美只有一天的时间帮悟空摘下金刚箍。

programme.title: 台湾1001个故事 2 Taiwan's 1001 Stories 2 - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) This food programme introduces Taiwan's traditional cuisines and their ingredients and spices. It also discloses touching stories behind the cuisines. (重)美食节目介绍有特色的台湾料理，也同时披露每道菜肴背后的感人故事。

programme.title: 求学地图 Schools Unlimited - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Over 100,000 students around the world are attracted to the 43 universities in London annually. In this episode, host Lee Teng visits two Singaporean students, who are studying in the London College of Fashion and University of Cambridge, to see how they cope with study and prepare for the future. (重)伦敦市区内有四十三所大学，每年吸引了超过十万名来自世界各地的学生前来进修学习。这一集，主持人李腾探访在伦敦时装学院和剑桥大学法律系就读的本地留学生，看他们怎么稳扎稳打，专心学业，为璀璨未来做好准备。

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 79
programme.desc: (R) Dashi feels bad about Zhenshu being criticized because of Xianying's action. He thus tells the reporters about how Zhenshu has donated one of her kidneys to Meici. Zhenshu's reputation is salvaged following this piece of news. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)达石为仙英向记者爆料而害了真淑的事感到过意不去，于是主动告诉记者真淑捐肾给美慈的事。淑子为了公司和英鎬，要美慈跟真淑一起接受采访。两人看似相亲相爱，成功挽救真淑的声誉。

programme.title: 大力女都奉顺 Strong Girl Bong-Soon - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Minhe learned that his second and most trusted brother, Dong-suk, is the one who has terrorized him. The news is overwhelming and Minhe is crushed. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)敏赫从两个歹徒首领的口中得知幕后黑手是他最信任的二哥，敏赫完全接受不了. 除了失望和愤怒，还让敏赫觉得痛心。

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 39
programme.desc: Haizhu finds out that Maya is actually Ruli's daughter, Xiaochun. She is infuriated by the realization of having raised Ruli's daughter and Zhiyuan having lied to her all these years. Zhiyuan reveals that Jiaya could be suffering the same sickness as Haichen, and Maya may be their saviour one day. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)海珠得知玛亚是如莉的女儿，非常崩溃，她不能相信自己爱了那么久的女儿竟然是如莉的，智媛跟她说嘉亚很有可能得跟海成一样的病，所以领养着玛亚，有可能会是将来挽救嘉亚的人，海珠内心痛苦，却只能忍着。

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 40
programme.desc: Zhiyuan demands to see the complete video that Yunxue is using to threaten her but knowing that the video is incomplete, Yunxue refused. Wulie asks his mother not to reveal to Yunxue that Maya is Xiaochun. Jiaya was about to tell Maya that he saw her photos on TV but was stopped by Haizhu. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)智媛要看完整版的视频才能确认道英受伤是自己害的，而视频的后半部分尹雪还在找人复原当中，尹雪拒绝给她。武烈不让他母亲说出玛亚是尹雪的孩子。嘉亚之前在电视上看到尹雪拿着玛亚的照片，想把事件告诉玛亚，被海珠阻止。

programme.title: 食材地图 Our Daily Food - EP 2
programme.desc: In this episode, let's follow Pornsak & Cui Fang to explore the production process and cultural heritage of Japanese tofu, how Taiwanese fermented tofu manufacturer uses various ingredients to develop into different flavours and the cultivation of organic kailan in Malaysia and Taiwanese cabbage. 在这一集的《食材地图》节目中，跟随Pornsak和林翠芳一窥日本豆腐的制作过程和文化底蕴，看台湾豆腐乳厂家如何利用不同的食材融合，研制出不同口味的豆腐乳，了解台湾高丽菜和马来西亚有机芥蓝菜的种植。

programme.title: 花遊記 A Korean Odyssey - EP 32
programme.desc: Wukong finally recalls his past with Shanmei. He removes the gold band in front of her and confesses his love for her. Wukong gives Shanmei one of his eyes before she is brought back to the netherworld. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(大结局)(双声道-中/韩)悟空终于想起跟善美的点滴，在她面前把金刚箍摘下，还跟善美说他爱她。悟空在善美会冥界前将一只火眼金睛给善美，说日后会用眼睛认出善美。

programme.title: 烧。卖 Served H.O.T. - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Tai Hu wants to steal over Nanyang eatery's customers to their restaurant chain. He managed to invite celebrity chef Gordon Ramy to be part of his events. Owen turned his nose up at Gordon Ramy's westernized Roast Pork Noodles and openly challenged Gordon Ramy to see who can make better Char Siew. (PG)(重)小吃店名声大噪，电视台来采访，但富贵有隐忧。欧文不屑Gordon Ramy自创的‘叉烧云吞面’，向对方下战书。欧文要以道地云吞面挑战名厨，此举遭队友们强力反对。欧文失落离开小吃店，结果惨被围殴。.

programme.title: 线人2 Fixer 2 - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) The Citarum River in Indonesia is one of the dirtiest rivers in the world. The pollution issue has become a public health hazard. The villagers are the innocent victims who have nowhere to lodge complaints. Will their grievances be heard by the authority and improve on the deteriorating condition? (重)印度尼西亚的芝塔龙河，是全世界最肮脏的河流之一。河流的污染问题已演变成公共健康危。村民是殃及池鱼的无辜者，无处可投诉的苦楚，日复一日的恶性循环，哪一天才会得到妥善的处理，他们的心声执政者听得到吗？.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 80
programme.desc: (R) Zaiyong lies to Minzhi that Yinghao wants to give him a sum of money in exchange for the memory drive, then sends the loan sharks to give Minzhi a beating right after Minzhi has handed over the memory drive. Minzhi falls during the struggle and hurts his head. He dies shortly after. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)载永骗民植说英鎬托他把一笔钱拿给民植。民植开心，计划拿到钱就离开韩国。载永从民植手上接获随身碟后，立刻安排民植被高利贷业者围攻。民植与高利贷业者纠缠时，跌倒撞到头部，伤重不治。.

programme.title: 大力女都奉顺 Strong Girl Bong-Soon - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) The serial kidnapper goes to the hospital to harm Jingxin but Fengshun pops up just in time to stop him injecting Jingxin with poison and chased after the kidnapper. Guodou storms into Jingxin's room to berate Fengshun for chasing the kidnapper herself without concern for her own safety. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)嫌犯来到京心的病房，正欲向京心注射不明液体，却被奉顺拦了下来。国斗得知奉顺不顾危险去追犯人，大发雷霆，两人争吵起来。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 41
programme.desc: Zhiyuan is relieved after she discovered the video that Yunxue threatened her with is incomplete. Daozhi announces he is marrying Yunxue over the weekend, making Wulie unhappy. In order to stop Yunxue seeing Maya, Haizhu decides to send her overseas. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)智媛知道尹雪手里拿着没有说服力的视频，大感安心。得知道治将在周末与尹雪举行婚宴，武烈失望。为了不让尹雪接近玛亚，海珠打算送玛亚出国。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 42
programme.desc: On Daozhi and Yunxue's wedding day, Yunxue is arrested by the police on a tip-off by Zhiyuan. Yunxue changes her identity back to Ruli and is jailed for 2 years. Ruli receives an anonymous letter stating she will take care of Xiaochun and attached Xiaochun's hair. Ruli is excited. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)道治与尹雪婚礼当天, 警方带人来抓尹雪，智媛作证尹雪就是当年的逃犯。尹雪打算回复如莉身份，最终被判刑两年。在监狱里她收到一封来信，里面还放着玛亚的头发，还鼓励她不要放弃活下去的希望，如莉非常兴奋。.

programme.title: 寻医 A Medical Journey - EP 5
programme.desc: In Vietnam, more than 300 patients died of cancer every day. Jojo Goh visits the biggest cancer facility in Hanoi - the K Hospital to understand how cancer is turning into a health crisis. A trip to a cancer village also reveals a bleak environmental hazard which threatens the people's health. 越南每天有超过300人因癌症不治而丧命。主持人吴俐璇拜访越南北部城市河内最大的癌症医院，了解儿童癌症病患的情况与寻医历程。她也前往城外的一个“癌症村”，发现当地的工业污染日趋严重，严重威胁市民的健康。.

programme.title: 武法律師 Lawless Lawyer - EP 1
programme.desc: A judge sentences a woman to 20 years in jail for murdering her abusive husband. The accused's lawyer, He Zaiyi, punches the judge as she thinks the punishment is unfair. Zaiyi is sacked by her law firm for her outburst of emotions. (PG13-暴力镜头)(首播)(双声道-中/韩)一名妇女杀了对她和女儿施暴的丈夫。法官判该妇女入狱20年，辨方律师河在伊不满判决，跟法官起争执，打了法官一拳，被罚停止执业六个月，还被律师行解雇。.

Ruli receives an anonymous letter stating she will take care of Xiaochun and attached Xiaochun's hair. Ruli is excited. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)道治与尹雪婚礼当天, 警方带人来抓尹雪，智媛作证尹雪就是当年的逃犯。尹雪打算回复如莉身份，最终被判刑两年。在监狱里她收到一封来信，里面还放着玛亚的头发，还鼓励她不要放弃活下去的希望，如莉非常兴奋。.

programme.title: 离家。出走 Greener Pastures - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Increasingly, many Chinese have found love and romance with foreign spouses. When a foreigner enters into marriage with someone from another culture and nationality, it starts a new chapter in their lives. What is the price to pay in such a seemingly romantic union? (重)中国实行对外开放政策后，为跨国婚姻打开了一道大门。在这道大门后，中国人与来自世界各地的人相遇，谱写出一个又一个的爱情故事。当离家的人走进跨国婚姻，也等于义无反顾地走进了另一个陌生国度，为自己的人生翻开了新的一页。在这些浪漫的跨国婚姻背后，他们又付出了什么代价呢？.

programme.title: 吃。东西 World Food - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) The Westerners eat bread and Easterners eat buns. Why bread is baked in Western countries and bun is steamed in China? In this episode, Guo Liang, Axian and Pornsak discuss about the origin of bread, different ways of making and eating bread, mantou, bread and buns in France, Singapore and Malaysia. (重)西方人吃面包，东方人吃包点。为什么在国外烤面包，在中国成了蒸馒头？这一集节目里，郭亮，阿贤和Pornsak会为我们介绍面包的来源，不同的制作和吃法，馒头的南北叫法，法国各类面包和南洋一带的包子和面包。.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 81
programme.desc: (R) Xianying deliberately tells Zhenshu that Yinghao was the one who knocked Yingcai down four years ago. Zhenshu wants to report Yinghao to the police. Shuzi goes on her knees and begs Zhenshu to let Yinghao off. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)仙英在餐厅碰见真淑，为了让真淑的日子不好过，故意告诉真淑撞倒英彩的是英镐。真淑要把英鎬拖到警局去，被淑子阻止。淑子向真淑下跪，求她放过英鎬。.

programme.title: 大力女都奉顺 Strong Girl Bong-Soon - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) This time, Minhe took Fengshun home for breakfast as his pretend girlfriend. At the table, Minhe's father asked Fengshun, the reason she likes Minhe. Minhe's father told Fengshun that Minhe has been messing around with women for a while, which made Fengshun realise Minhe is not gay. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)此次敏赫帶著奉順来自己家吃早饭，扮演他的女友。餐桌前，敏赫爸爸询问扮作敏赫未婚妻的奉顺喜欢敏赫的原因，并在饭后告诉奉顺敏赫曾经有一段时间和女人乱搞过。奉顺这才明白，敏赫不是同性恋。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 43
programme.desc: Ruli is happy when the DNA test shows that Xiaochun is biologically-related to her. Zhiyuan and Wulie try to sabotage Monian's business, but fail. Zhiyuan conspires with Ruli's cellmate, Wang Shaonu, to frame Ruli. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)验证结果显示如莉与小春是亲子关系，如莉充满希望。智媛与武烈陷害末年的计划失败。智媛买通如莉的狱友王少女，以施暴一事让如莉加刑。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 44
programme.desc: Wang Shaonu and her husband fall into Monian's trap and confess that Zhiyuan and Wulie have instructed them to sabotage Ruli and her parents. Ruli picks up fashion design in jail. Haizhu copies Ruli's design and submits the design in the fashion design competition held by WID Group. Monian submits Ruli's design too. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)王少女夫妇透露是智媛与武烈指使他们陷害如莉与末年夫妇。如莉在监狱里学服装设计。，WID集团打算举行服装招募会,海珠抄袭如莉的时装设计参加比赛，如莉则让末年把自己的设计作品拿去参赛。.

programme.title: 线人 3 Fixer 3 - EP 13
programme.desc: In Hokkaido, there is a forgotten group of people known as the Ainu, they sing and dance to express their love for the Earth and believe in animism. They have ever been discriminated and exploited but the Japanese Cabinet passed new bill to recognise them as the indigenous people. Who are they? (最后一集)日本北海道，住着一群被遗忘的族群，以歌舞传颂对大地的敬爱，相信万物皆有灵，他们就是爱奴人。他们曾经被歧视和剥削，日本内阁会议通过新法案承认爱奴为原住民。打破日本单一民族的神话。究竟，爱奴人是谁？.

programme.title: 武法律師 Lawless Lawyer - EP 2
programme.desc: Shangbi wants Zaiyi to work for him and pay off her father's debts bit by bit. Shangbi brings Zaiyi to visit Jiongwan in jail. Zaiyi cannot understand Shangbi's motive for wanting to represent Jiongwan when it is quite clear that there's no way for Jiongwan to be acquitted. (PG13-暴力镜头)(双声道-中/韩)尚弼要在伊到他的律师事务所边工作边帮她父亲还债。尚弼带在伊到牢里见炯万，说他有信心让炯万出狱。在伊觉得炯万几乎确定会被判罪，根本没有胜诉的理由，不明白尚弼为何要争取当炯万的律师。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 看见你的声音 I Can See Your Voice - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) "I Can See Your Voice" is a reality show in which guests must attempt to determine whether the contestant is a skilled vocalist or a tone-deaf contestant without hearing them sing. (重)《看見你的声音》是一档嘉宾凭视觉判断选手是否专业演唱实力还是音痴的新概念推理类音乐综艺节目。.

programme.title: 加文纳桥的约定 Love At Cavenagh Bridge - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Yi Qun is a passionate photographer. One day, while looking through his collection of photos at Cavenagh Bridge, he noticed a mysterious girl in frame. He had no idea who she was and why she was there; it wasn't his intention to take photos of her but somehow she appeared repeatedly in the shots that he captured. What followed was a series of unnerving and even creepy encounters that brought him, and psychiatrist Pei Zhen together, as if it was predestined that they should meet. Zhang Dan Fei is a police inspector. He takes up a fake identity Birdie and sets up a transaction at Cavenagh Bridge, in order to lure out the mastermind behind the jewel smuggling syndicate. When he finally meets the target Red Eagle, he was shocked to find that she looks exactly like his university sweetheart Zi Shan! Ironically, he and Zi Shan used to meet up at Cavenagh Bridge too. With this twist of fate, the two who used to be lovers are now foes. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)亦群热爱拍照，有一天他发现一个神秘的女孩出现在他拍摄加纹纳桥的照片集里。然而，他对这个女孩完全没有印象，根本没有任何概念，她是及时被拍到。接踵而来的，更是一连串诡异、惊悚的奇遇，但竟然无意中让亦群和心理医生，佩珍走在一起。这是冥冥中早已经注定的缘分吗？卧底警探张丹飞化名“小鸟"和歹徒在加纹纳桥上进行走私珠宝的交易。在会见对头人“红鹰"的时候，赫然发现红鹰跟大学时期的“女神"紫衫长得一模一样！讽刺的是，当年两人正是在加纹纳桥上邂逅，到底是命运捉弄，当年的小恋人今天竟然成为天敌？还是根本就是人有相似？.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 82
programme.desc: (R) Minzhi's wife asks Xiantai to help retrieve Minzhi's belongings at the police station. Xiantai sees the video recording that Minzhi sent to Yinghao via his mobile phone previously and finally discovers that Yinghao was the one who knocked down Yingcai. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)民植的妻子要求贤泰到警局领取民植的遗物，然后帮她保管。贤泰从民植的手机看到民植发给贤泰的影片，知道英鎬就是开车撞倒英彩的司机。.

programme.title: 大力女都奉顺 Strong Girl Bong-Soon - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) Fengshun arrived at Baizhuo's warehouse where she started a fight with Baizhuo's men. One of Baizhuo's men with a knife emerges from his hiding place behind Fengshun, Minhe jumps in front of her just in time to shield her from the blade. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)奉顺来到白卓指定的仓库后，与白卓的手下动起手来。流氓头目拿着刀冲向奉顺时，敏赫为奉顺挨了一刀，倒在地上。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 45
programme.desc: Haizhu emerges winner in the fashion design competition. Ruli suddenly appears at the award ceremony and exposes Haizhu for copying her design. Haizhu is shocked to realise that Ruli has been released from jail earlier than expected. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)海珠的设计得了第一名。 海珠要发表获奖感言时，如莉突然出现，拆穿海珠盗窃了自己的作品。海珠没想到如莉提早出狱，大吃一惊。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 46
programme.desc: Maya overheard from Wulie's mother that she is an adopted child. She runs away from home and meets with an accident. Maya needs a blood transfusion and Daozhi is surprised to find out that Maya's blood type does not match those belonging to Haizhu and Wulie. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)玛亚从武烈母亲口中得知自己是被领养的。玛亚离家出走，却遭遇车祸。玛亚失血过多需要输血，却发现她的血型与武烈和海珠的血型不符合，道治觉得奇怪。.

programme.title: 台湾1001个故事 3 Taiwan's 1001 Stories 3 - EP 4
programme.desc: Hosted by Bai Xinyi, this food programme introduces Taiwan's traditional cuisines and their ingredients and spices. It also discloses touching stories behind the cuisines. 介绍台湾在地食材的故事，也是台湾最深刻的人生故事。故事的主角们，有的为着有机农业奋斗打拼，为这片土地奉献青春与血汗。 有的则是经过千百次的调味与尝试，只为了成就一道美味料理。对比着经营者与料理人的故事，他们或是为生活中年转业、或是离乡背井追寻梦想，人生路上各自遭逢百转千折的冲突与适应，才能在逆境中成功蜕变。.

programme.title: 武法律師 Lawless Lawyer - EP 3
programme.desc: Shangbi reveals his identity to Jiongwan. Jiongwan knows Shangbi has hatred towards him, but still decides to appoint Shangbi as his defence lawyer as he does not want to die in jail. (PG13-暴力镜头)(双声道-中/韩)尚弼告诉炯万他就是当年咬了他一口的男孩。尽管知道尚弼对他怀恨在心，但因为知道自己可能会在监狱里被五洲的手下暗算，炯万决定让尚弼担任他的辩护律师，要尚弼帮他脱罪，出狱后两人再为当年的事谈判。.

programme.title: 梦想的声音 2 Sound Of My Dream 2 - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Produced by the same people behind Sing!, Sound of My Dream boasts 5 top-notch mentors, (Sandy Lam, JJ Lin, Yu Quan Group, Jane Zhang), impressive sets and production, and a very unique contest format. The contest witnesses the challenges and preparation each mentor puts into their performances as they prove their worth. And it features stellar performances from mentors and amateurs alike. (重)本季四组常驻导师为羽泉、林忆莲、林俊杰和张靓颖，主持人为华少。另从本季开始新设立客座导师一位，称之为“神秘导师”，每期更换。第二季在选歌方式与上季不同，选歌、定歌都在录影前，练歌则是在录影前6小时之内完成（上季只有3小时，这季增加音樂導師练歌时间）；6小时后在舞台将直接接受追梦歌手讨教。.

programme.title: Wasabi 新体验 Find The Wasabi 2 - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) "Find the Wasabi 2" is a 'reality-game travelogue' series featuring 3 Asian celebrities who are on a special mission to find the 'secret spice' of Japan... In each episode, the Hunters are challenged by a powerful "Commander" to solve 'mysteries' about Japan that puzzle people around the world. (重)WASABI新体验第二季再出击，徐鸣杰将与来自泰国及马来西亚的朋友在日本学习当忍者，通过不同的任务竞赛，探索不为人知的日本文化，带给你潮流、美食、旅游等第一手资料，发现日本新魅力！这一系列的Wasabi主持人是性感女神藤原纪香。.

programme.title: 大话精 True Lies - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Nadia and Aidan starts dating. Jenny jumps ship to another company and Ming Lie introduces a new colleague who turns out to be Mei Qi. Aidan is shocked to see that Mei Qi looks exactly like Eva and is certain that Eva is faking Mei Qi's identity. Nadia insists that Mei Qi is her long lost sister. Aidan is worried that Nadia will get scammed; he tries to prove that Mei Qi is actually Eva and ends up arguing with Nadia. (PG)(重)Nadia和Aidan开始交往。珍妮跳槽别的公司，明烈介绍新同事，竟是美琪！Aidan惊见美琪与伊娃一样长相，认定是伊娃冒认美琪！但Nadia却说美琪就是自己失散的亲妹妹。Aidan担心Nadia被骗，想证明美琪是伊娃，却一再与Nadia发生口角。.

programme.title: 线人 3 Fixer 3 - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) In Hokkaido, there is a forgotten group of people known as the Ainu, they sing and dance to express their love for the Earth and believe in animism. They have ever been discriminated and exploited but the Japanese Cabinet passed new bill to recognise them as the indigenous people. Who are they? programme.title: 爷爷的路 My Grandfather's Road - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) My Grandfather's Road aims to uncover even more roads in Singapore named after notable founding fathers and pioneers through their descendants. Through in-depth interviews, archive footages and show and tells, we will learn more about the country's past as well as the people who helped make Singapore the success that it is today. (重)《爷爷的路》的目的是发现更多以开国元勋和先锋而命名的马路。通过深入采访他们的子孙后裔、录像档案、演出和口述，让我们对国家的历史以及建国功臣们有更加深入的了解。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 47
programme.desc: (R) Junjiu's wife pleads for Yiyuan to allow them to continue with the franchise business. Yiyuan says she is angered because Haixiu has snatched Yuzhen from her and that she will sign a new contract with Junjiu only if Haixiu moves out from the Zhengs' residence. programme.title: Confucian Dream
programme.desc: Chaoyan, a young wife and mother, discovers the ancient teachings of Confucianism and hopes they will restore balance, respect and morality to her home. She becomes a zealous convert and involves her impressionable four-year-old son in her rigorous routine of chanting daily mantras. A gripping portrait of marital and parental crisis, Confucian Dream demonstrates the devastating effects of misplacing your expectations of a spouse onto a child.
